item.title: [Crash] freezer on map c1a2c
item.dc:creator: Zal
item.description:
Evening,

I’ve experienced two crashes on map c1a2c while inside the freezer area, both standing in different positions.

The first crash occured when a head crab jumped towards me and landed on my head. As soon as I looked up I CTD’d.

The second crash occurred in a different room within the freezer, the room with a dead scientist and security officer zombie. I nealt down to admire the model ( ); as soon as I turned around I CTD’d.

Both crashes yielded a message: Too many verts for a dynamic vertex buffer (32974>32768 ). Tell a programmer to up VERTEX BUFFER SIZE".

The above message appeared during the second crash, which only seems to occur when i get extremely close to the blue closed doorway and turn around quickly.

I have attached both crash dumps.

Thanks againf or this fantastic game, i’m really enjoying it
